Career Objective:        
  To work in a challenging environment in the field of Plant Erection and 
maintenance to bring value to the company and to enrich knowledge with
positive attitude. I am looking a job as a Mechanical Engineer where my 
experience and abilities can be utilized more efficiently. I have the 
abilities to adopt myself to the job environment. I am confident      that I 
will prove to be a useful addition to your renowned organization. I would 
like to learn new methods and technology and implement it to the 
betterment of the organisation in future.
